I was also expecting "vintage" stuff.

Sweet Jesus.   I've never seen anything like these pictures before.   In a way, they're quite remarkable.  Dead women.  Many of them nude, some of them hauntingly lovely, others decomposing or cruelly disfigured a la Betty Short.  A lot of these woman are clearly victims of horrible sex crimes, their panties pushed aside, their sad crumpled bodies discarded like used Trojans. One woman appears to have had her brains blown out while she was lying in bed, and then her corpse was pulled out of bed, propped up on the floor with her ass in the air, and fucked.  That's sure what it looks like. Horrible, but, in a way, merciful.

These are pictures of a sad, horrible truth, and the truth is always a good thing for those who can handle it.  Seeing these pictures could be a good thing for some people.  You might start treating women  with more respect., or be inspired to write a really good crime novel, or go volunteer at a woman's shelter. 

But you won't be able to unsee these pictures. So be aware.
